summary: Somehow, an unforeseen malfunction in a man's spectacles blurs the frail bounds between reality and parallel reality, allowing instances of a dark and dystopian future to seep into his world.
cast: Lambert Wilson|Samuel Joslin|Darrell D'Silva|Stephen Thompson|Scott Hinds|Alex Warren|Alison Baker|Juliet Adler|Milton MacGrory
title: The Nostalgist
